ISSUE.TITLE: How can I use openstf for running appium tests
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I want to use open stf for running our appium tests. I have installed the beta version of release which has api's. Our framework is in ruby and wanted to know how can use the api's provided to run our appium tests. I am having issue accessing the url http://vbanthia.github.io/angular-swagger-ui/ it shows 404.
